Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation:
#dim %request As %CSP.Request #dim %response As %CSP.Response
Set Method = $Get(%request.Data("method",1))
xecute "do .."_Method_"()"
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: MontaTela
Method.Implementation:
set pYBED = $get(%request.Data("YBED",1)) set Y = "~" set YM = 0 ; set objWWW013 = $get(^WWW013(0,pYBED,1)) set perfil = $$$WWW013FREE7(objWWW013) set codWidget = 4 ; set dataHoraPreparacao = $piece($get(^DashboardDados(YM,"W4")),Y,2) if (dataHoraPreparacao = "") { write "|" quit $$$OK }else{ write $zdatetime(dataHoraPreparacao,4,2)_"|" } set qtdeBloco = "" &sql(Select Count(*) Into :qtdeBloco From SQLUser.DashboardWidget4Usuario Where Company = 0 And Usuario = :pYBED) ;Define Quantiade de Bloco por linha set qtdeCol = qtdeBloco#6 if ((qtdeCol=1||(qtdeCol=2))&&((qtdeBloco#5)'=1)) set qtdeCol=5 else set qtdeCol=6 ; set meuSQL = "Select Usuario.Bloco, Usuario.ColunaExibir, Usuario.TipoExibicao, Usuario.Item, " set meuSQL = meuSQL _"Descricao, CorRodape, Icone, Descricao1, CorRodape1, Icone1, Consultar " set meuSQL = meuSQL _"From SQLUser.DashboardWidget4Usuario as Usuario, " set meuSQL = meuSQL _"SQLUser.DashboardWidget4 as Bloco " set meuSQL = meuSQL _"Where Usuario.Company = 0 And Usuario.Usuario = '"_pYBED_"' And " set meuSQL = meuSQL _"Usuario.Bloco = Bloco.CodigoBloco Order By Usuario.Item" ; set objStatement = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() set qStatus = objStatement.%Prepare(meuSQL) set rSet = objStatement.%Execute() ; write "
" while (rSet.%Next()) { set bloco = rSet.%Get("Bloco") set colunaExibir = rSet.%Get("ColunaExibir") set tipoExibir = rSet.%Get("TipoExibicao") set item = rSet.%Get("Item") set descricao = rSet.%Get("Descricao") set corRodape = rSet.%Get("CorRodape") set icone = rSet.%Get("Icone") set consultar = +rSet.%Get("consultar") if (+colunaExibir'=1) { set descricao = rSet.%Get("Descricao1") set corRodape = rSet.%Get("CorRodape1") set icone = rSet.%Get("Icone1") } set (valor, qtde) = 0 if ($data(^DashboardDadosW1(0,bloco))) { set valor = $piece(^DashboardDadosW1(0,bloco,1),Y,3) set qtde = $piece(^DashboardDadosW1(0,bloco,1),Y,2) } set conteudoCSS = "" if (tipoExibir = 1) set dadosExibir = $fnumber(qtde,".",0), conteudoCSS = "font-size: 20px; line-height: 50px;" if (tipoExibir = 2) set dadosExibir = "R$
"_$fnumber(valor,".",2) if (tipoExibir = 3) set dadosExibir = $fnumber(qtde,".",0)_"
("_$fnumber(valor,".",2)_")" if (perfil'="") { if ('$data(^DashboardWidgetPerfilWidgetSubWidget(0,perfil,codWidget,bloco))) continue set permissao = $piece(^DashboardWidgetPerfilWidgetSubWidget(0,perfil,codWidget,bloco,1),"~",1) if (permissao = 1 && (tipoExibir '= 1)) continue if (permissao = 2 && (tipoExibir '= 2)) continue } write "
" write "
" write "
" write dadosExibir write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" write descricao write "
" write "
" write "
" write "" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" } if (rSet.%ROWCOUNT = 0) { write "
" write "
" write "
" write "Selecionar
Bloco" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "Adicionar" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" write "
" } write "
" quit $$$OK

Method.name: ListaBlocos
SelecionaBloco
ReposicionarBloco
RemoveBloco
Method.Implementation:
set pItem = $get(%request.Data("item",1)) set pYBED = $get(%request.Data("YBED",1))
&sql(Delete SQLUser.DashboardWidget4Usuario Where Usuario = :pYBED And Item = :pItem)

Method.name: ListaBlocosCadastrar
ArmazenaBloco
Method.Implementation: $$$VAR set YM = 0 set Y = "~" ; set pCodBloco = $get(%request.Data("pCodBloco",1)) set pDados = $get(%request.Data("pDados",1)) set YBED = $get(%request.Data("YBED",1)) set YUSER = $get(%request.Data("YUSER",1)) ; set objArm = ##class(%DynamicAbstractObject).%FromJSON(pDados) ; if (pCodBloco = "") { set flag = "" set codBloco = $order(^DashboardWidget4(0,""),-1) + 1 set meuSQL = "Insert SQLUser.DashboardWidget4 Set Company = 0, CodigoBloco = "_codBloco_" " if (objArm.%Get("descricao")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", Descricao = '"_objArm.%Get("descricao")_"' ", flag = 1 if (objArm.%Get("cor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", CorRodape = '"_objArm.%Get("cor")_"' ", flag = 1 if (objArm.%Get("icone")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", Icone = '"_objArm.%Get("icone")_"' ", flag = 1 if (objArm.%Get("descricaoValor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", Descricao1 = '"_objArm.%Get("descricaoValor")_"' ", flag = 1 if (objArm.%Get("corValor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", CorRodape1 = '"_objArm.%Get("corValor")_"' ", flag = 1 if (objArm.%Get("iconeValor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", Icone1 = '"_objArm.%Get("iconeValor")_"' ", flag = 1 if (objArm.%Get("consultar")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ ", Consultar = '"_objArm.%Get("consultar")_"' ", flag = 1 if (flag '= "") { set objStatement = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() set qStatus = objStatement.%Prepare(meuSQL) set rSet = objStatement.%Execute() } }else{ set flag = "" set meuSQL = "Update SQLUser.DashboardWidget4 Set " if (objArm.%Get("descricao")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"Descricao = '"_objArm.%Get("descricao")_"' ", flag = "," if (objArm.%Get("cor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"CorRodape = '"_objArm.%Get("cor")_"' ", flag = "," if (objArm.%Get("icone")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"Icone = '"_objArm.%Get("icone")_"' ", flag = "," if (objArm.%Get("descricaoValor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"Descricao1 = '"_objArm.%Get("descricaoValor")_"' ", flag = "," if (objArm.%Get("corValor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"CorRodape1 = '"_objArm.%Get("corValor")_"' ", flag = "," if (objArm.%Get("iconeValor")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"Icone1 = '"_objArm.%Get("iconeValor")_"' ", flag = "," if (objArm.%Get("consultar")'="") set meuSQL = meuSQL _ flag _"Consultar = '"_objArm.%Get("consultar")_"' ", flag = "," set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where CodigoBloco = '"_pCodBloco_"'" if (flag '= "") { set objStatement = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() set qStatus = objStatement.%Prepare(meuSQL) set rSet = objStatement.%Execute() } } ; quit $$$OK ;

Method.name: ApagaBloco
Method.Implementation: $$$VAR set YM = 0 set Y = "~" ; set pCodBloco = $get(%request.Data("pCodBloco",1)) set YBED = $get(%request.Data("YBED",1)) set YUSER = $get(%request.Data("YUSER",1)) ; set meuSQL = "Delete SQLUser.DashboardWidget4 Where CodigoBloco = '"_pCodBloco_"'" set objStatement = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() set qStatus = objStatement.%Prepare(meuSQL) set rSet = objStatement.%Execute() ; quit $$$OK

Method.name: RecuperaRotina
